requirements.summary: Remove the background image from the hero section and replace it with a solid color or gradient background while preserving all content and styling
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section no longer displays the cityscape background image
Hero section has an appropriate solid color or gradient background instead
All text, CTAs, and layout elements remain properly visible and styled
Section maintains its visual hierarchy and readability

file_operations.description: Remove the background image styling from the hero section container and replace it with a solid navy color or navy-to-blue gradient background. Update the className to remove background-image related styles while preserving the overlay, positioning, and all other layout properties. Ensure text contrast and readability are maintained with the new background.
